casebody.data:
Carlos TORRES
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 6, 2018

Temmy Ann Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Carlos Torres' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 460, 167 A.3d 1020 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
